forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
